SA07n943:2: yatra tatra vivikte tu baddhvā paryaṅkamuttamam |
SA07n943:4: nāsāgre vā lalāṭe vā bhruvorantara eva vā |
SA07n943:12: te hi tasmāt pravartante bhūyo vījādivāṅkurāḥ |
SA07n943:18: ye mṛgyamāṇā duḥkhāya rakṣyamāṇā na śāntaye |
SA07n943:19: bhraṣṭāḥ śokāya mahate prāptāśca na vitṛptaye ||9 ||
SA07n943:21: kāmebhyaśca sukhotpattiṃ yaḥ paśyati sa naśyati ||10 ||
SA07n943:24: vyāpādo vā vihiṃsā vā kṣobhayed yadi te manaḥ |
SA07n943:29: hanti pāṃsubhirātmānaṃ sa snāta iva vāraṇaḥ ||14 ||
SA07n943:32: duṣṭena ceha manasā bādhyate vā paro na vā |
SA07n943:33: sadyastu dahyate tāvat svaṃ mano duṣṭacetasaḥ ||16 ||
SA07n943:34: tasmāt sarveṣu bhūteṣu maitrīṃ kāruṇyameva ca |
SA07n943:47: na ca taṃ guṇamāpnoti bandhanāya ca kalpate ||23 ||
SA07n943:49: mohaṃ vrajati kāluṣyaṃ narakāya ca vartate ||24 ||
SA07n943:54: tyaktvā ratnaṃ yathā loṣṭaṃ ratnadvīpācca saṃharet |
SA07n943:56: himavantaṃ yathā gatvā viṣaṃ bhuñjīta nauṣadham |
SA07n943:57: manuṣyatvaṃ tathā prāpya pāpaṃ seveta no śubham ||28 ||
SA07n943:63: ko janaḥ svajanaḥ ko vā mohāt sakto jane janaḥ ||31 ||
SA07n943:66: vihagānāṃ yathā sāyaṃ tatra tatra samāgamaḥ |
SA07n943:67: jātau jātau tathāśleṣo janasya svajanasya ca ||33 ||
SA07n943:72: bibharti hi sutaṃ mātā dhārayiṣyati māmiti |
SA07n943:75: tadā snehaṃ prakurvanti riputvaṃ tu viparyayāt ||37 ||
SA07n943:79: tathā kṛtvā svayaṃ snehaṃ saṃgameti jane janaḥ ||39 ||
SA07n943:81: sa te karmathaṃ kurute tvaṃ vā tasmai karoṣi kam ||40 ||
SA07n943:83: vyavasthā nāsti saṃsāre svajanasya janasya ca ||41 ||
SA07n943:86: praheyaḥ sa tvayā saumya nādhivāsyaḥ kathaṃcana |
SA07n943:89: sarvatra niyataṃ duḥkhaṃ na kvacid vidyate śivam ||44 ||
SA07n943:90: kvacicchītaṃ kvacid dharmaḥ kvacid rogo bhayaṃ kvacit |
SA07n943:92: jarā vyādhiśca mṛtyuśca lokasyāsya mahad bhayam |
SA07n943:93: nāsti deśaḥ sa yatrāsya tad bhayaṃ nopapadyate ||46 ||
SA07n943:95: nāsti kācid gatirloke gato yatra na bādhyate ||47 ||
SA07n943:96: ramaṇīyo'pi deśaḥ san subhikṣaḥ kṣema eva ca |
SA07n943:99: kṣemaḥ kaścinna deśo'sti svastho yatra gato bhavet ||49 ||
SA07n943:100: duḥkhaṃ sarvatra sarvasya vartate sarvadā yadā |
SA07n943:106: muhūrtamapi viśrambhaḥ kāryoṃ na khalu jīvite |
SA07n943:107: nilīna iva hi vyāghraḥ kālo viśvastaghātakaḥ ||53 ||
SA07n943:108: balastho'haṃ yuvā veti na te bhavitumarhati |
SA07n943:111: svāsthyāśā jīvitāśā vā na dṛṣṭārthasya jāyate ||55 ||
SA07n943:112: nirvṛttaḥ ko bhavet kāyaṃ mahābhūtāśrayaṃ vahan |
SA07n943:117: svapityutthāya vā bhūyo bahvamitrā hi dehinaḥ ||58 ||
SA07n943:122: sāmnā dānena bhedena daṇḍena niyamena vā |
SA07n943:123: prāpto hi rabhaso mṛtyuḥ pratihantuṃ na śakyate ||61 ||
SA07n943:125: nityaṃ harati kālo hi sthāviryaṃ na pratīkṣate ||62 ||

SA07n943:139: viśodhya kleśebhyaḥ śamayati manaḥ saṃkṣipati ca ||68 ||
SA07n943:143: yathecchaṃ yatrecchaṃ śamayati manaḥ prerayati ca ||69 ||
